page.title: 09Religion Daubhill/Gt. Lever
page.content:
Most churches in our area have to be kept locked during the day because of possible vandalism or theft. They don't seem to be as well supported financially, or as well attended, as they used to be in the past. Some churches have changed their original denomination, like the{Church {of the Good Shepherd}in High Street. This is now a Polish Church but started off as{All Saints R.C. Church. The church at the bottom of Rishton Lane used to be known as{ {Victoria Methodist}and it had a junior school attached. It is now a mosque for the Muslim population and is known as {Medina Mosque.}The children come from quite a wide area every night to learn about the Koran.
Shelly Mather.
